dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Donalds introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committee on Science, Space, and Technology, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned

form.official-title: To provide additional Federal flexibility to enhance the development and deployment of advanced nuclear reactor technology, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Leverage Obligated appropriations for Advanced Nuclear Act or the LOAN Act.

section.header: Temporary exception to the denial of double benefit for certain loan guarantees related to the Advanced Reactor Demonstration Program

subsection.header: Funding for department of energy loan programs office
subsection.text: Section 50141(d)(3) of the Public Law 117–169 is amended—

paragraph.text: in subparagraph (C), by striking the or at the end;
in subparagraph (D), by striking guarantee. and inserting guarantee; or; and
by adding at the end the following:

subparagraph.text: during the period of 15 years that begins on the date of enactment of the LOAN Act, demonstration projects carried out under the program established under section 959A(b) of the Energy Policy Act of 2005 (42 U.S.C. 16279a(b)).

subsection.text: The 9th proviso in the matter under the heading Department of Energy, Title 17 Innovative Technology Loan Guarantee Authority Loan Program, in title III of division C of Public Law 111–8, is amended—

paragraph.text: by striking or (d) for electric generation projects and inserting (d) for electric generation projects; and

by inserting ; or (e) during the period of 15 years that begins on the date of enactment of the LOAN Act, demonstration projects carried out under the program established under section 959A(b) of the Energy Policy Act of 2005 (42 U.S.C. 16279a(b)) after independent of the project receiving the guarantee.

subsection.header: Department of Defense and Full-Year Continuing Appropriations Act, 2011
subsection.text: Section 1425 of the Department of Defense and Full-Year Continuing Appropriations Act, 2011 is amended—

paragraph.text: by striking or (4) electric generation projects and inserting (4) electric generation projects; and

by inserting ; or (5) during the period of 15 years that begins on the date of enactment of the LOAN Act, demonstration projects carried out under the program established under section 959A(b) of the Energy Policy Act of 2005 (42 U.S.C. 16279a(b)) after independent of the project receiving the guarantee.

section.header: Eligibility of advanced reactor demonstration projects for certain loan guarantees

subsection.text: Section 1703(b) of the Energy Policy Act of 2005 (42 U.S.C. 16513(b)) is amended by adding at the end the following:

paragraph.text: During the period of 15 years that begins on the date of enactment of the LOAN Act, demonstration projects carried out under the program established under section 959A(b).

subsection.text: Section 1706(b) of the Energy Policy Act of 2005 (42 U.S.C. 16517(b)) is amended by inserting and, during the period of 15 years that begins on the date of enactment of the LOAN Act, a demonstration project carried out under the program established under section 959A(b) after energy infrastructure.
